name: SNow-VAv0
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: servicenow voice assistant
des:
Checking the response we are getting from AWS lambda. 
Two scenarios implemented with AWS lambda. Not yet integrated the AWS lambda with ServiceNow.
Conversation:
User: Alexa open ServiceNow Voice assistant
Alexa: hello and welcome to servicenow voice assistant ! Say help to hear some options.
User: help
Alexa: You asked for help. Here something you can ask me: 1. whats happening today, 2. Tell me about 
 my critical incidents
User: whats happening today
Alexa: Hello , There are 1 critical Incident ticket and 2 pending approvals

The above conversation is implemented.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
